channel.title: Eternal Flame || 24/7 || GREAT ECO || 20+ ON 1 WEEK OPENED || ONLINE SENSATION!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/m356H8C.png?1[/img][/center]
[b]Forums & Client Link ![/b] -Forums - www.eternal-flames.enjin.com -Client - https://www.dropbox.com/s/qcu9vaq7ngkw2n9/Eternal%20Flame%20Client.jar?dl=0
[b]Server Features[/b] Bank tabs customize comp cape max cape exclusive yell easy advanced and elite tasks for comp cape community - 20+ on (need staff) great players nice and friendly loyalty system + title ranks PKing system kill streak soon high scores webclient soon + so much more just come see for yourself [u] [b]About Eternal Flame:[/b][/u]
We have came a long way of 2 months of development and have accomplished the great feeling of stability with no dupes, stable eco, and plenty more. I want to say thank you to all who beta tested and supported the server. Now we are ready for our advertising phase, which happens now :). We are a very complex rsps that offers a diverse things to do.. from gambling to bossing, from PKing to who has the most kills on the score board.
[b]Media:[/b] [i]Players online daily-[/i] [img]http://i.imgur.com/BkghuG7.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7oMT1Gk.png[/img]
Donator shop has new items in it every week + vote point shop does too- [img]http://i.imgur.com/BIL93dD.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/WUdlaB6.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/kw63sPm.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKDhmTw.png[/img] In conclusion: We have came a long way and I must say it has been a success and a great adventure watching the community play through the servers content and achieving the most complicated tasks on this server. Come give us a try !

item.title: Eternal Flame || 24/7 || GREAT ECO || 20+ ON 1 WEEK OPENED || ONLINE SENSATION!
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

flame255:

achieving max cash is hard thing to do good job. I’m sure your cheat client is really nice too

Bruh, it isn’t a good thing that people can exploit your server, despite you saying here:

This server isn't flawed, exploits none.

This shows that you yourself don’t even know the stability of your own server, everything comes after stability as it’s really the most important thing in a server. You shouldn’t shrug it off like it’s nothing my man. I really advise you to work on your server alot more before you release it :s

Read full topic

item.description:
@flame255 wrote:

I appreciate all the feedback positive or negative. This server isn’t flawed, exploits none. Also his review is 90% untrue :/. some things don’t work yes nothing is perfect, but he didn’t even do anything in the review but get mad because he spammed the call for help button…

item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Work on finding a domain and webhost (purchasing them) and just about the only thing I like is what you’ve done with the interfaces in terms of the minigames and skilling teleports. You have limited this thread with not that much media so I can judge from there, that’s about it - sorry. Good luck with the server.
